footer.tagline: Prioritizing what matters most to the user.

home.heroDescription: Mechnova provides reliable outdoor equipment for homeowners, small farms, and retail buyers who need machines that perform well, last long, and are priced fairly. Each product is built with a clear purpose — to handle essential tasks with consistent performance, simple operation, and easy maintenance.

about.title: Why Choose
about.reason1: When you rely on a machine, it should start without issues, run smoothly, and be easy to maintain.
about.reason2: Mechnova focuses on real-world performance. We use proven components and straightforward designs — prioritizing what matters most to the user.
about.reason3: This allows us to deliver strong value, without adding unnecessary cost or complexity.
about.reason4: Customers choose Mechnova for dependable equipment that does its job — every day, every season.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description1: At Mechnova, we are passionate about powering progress in agriculture, gardening, and industry through reliable, innovative, and affordable machinery. Backed by years of experience in international trade and engineering excellence, we bring to market a diverse portfolio of machines including brush cutters, chainsaws, sprayers, engines, generators, pumps, and more—designed to meet the evolving needs of modern users.
aboutSection.description2: We work closely with importers, wholesalers, and retailers to provide not just machines, but full-fledged business support—ensuring high-quality products, strong warranties, marketing assistance, and unmatched after-sales service. Whether it's a small garden or a large-scale agro-industrial operation, Mechnova is your trusted partner for performance and reliability.

gardeningForestry.title: Gardening & Forestry
gardeningForestry.description: Handle tough landscaping and forest maintenance tasks with our robust equipment. Key products: gasoline brush cutters, chainsaws, electric lawn mowers, earth augers. High performance, precision, and ease of use for pros and farm owners.

fumigation.title: Fumigation
fumigation.description: Protect crops and spaces with reliable fumigation tools. Gasoline backpack sprayers with brass pump and cordless backpack sprayers for wide coverage and easy application.

diesel.title: Diesel Machines
diesel.description: Powerful machines for demanding applications, especially off-grid. Diesel generators, engines, and motor pumps for irrigation, construction, and backup power.

domestic.title: Domestic
domestic.description: Simple, compact tools for everyday home and garden tasks. Electric pressure washers and gasoline vacuum blower for small gardens, vehicles, and light-duty work.

agroIndustrial.title: Agro Industrial
agroIndustrial.description: High-performance solutions for farms and agri-enterprises. Gasoline engines, motor pumps, and inverter generators for long-hour usage and rural electrification.

agriculture.title: Agriculture & Farming
agriculture.description: Reliable machines for irrigation, crop maintenance, and field prep—from gasoline engines to motor pumps and sprayers.

forestry.title: Forestry & Landscaping
forestry.description: Powerful brush cutters and chainsaws for clearing, pruning, and land management—ideal for tough terrain and precision work.

agroindustrial.title: Agroindustrial Enterprises
agroindustrial.description: High-performance generators and pumps built to support long operational hours and rural electrification for farms and agro-units.

domestic.title: Domestic Use
domestic.description: Compact tools like electric pressure washers and blowers—perfect for gardening, cleaning, and light maintenance at home.

greenhouses.title: Power & Utilities
greenhouses.description: Fumigation tools designed for large coverage areas, helping protect crops and stored goods efficiently and safely.

social.title: Digital Platforms
social.description: Stay connected with our latest updates, behind-the-scenes moments, and community highlights across our social media platforms.

data.name: Luis Fernando
data.message: We've been using Mechnova water pumps for our coffee farm irrigation, and the performance has been outstanding. It's reliable even during long-hour usage. Definitely worth the investment.

data.name: Ana Gabriela Torres
data.message: The backpack sprayer is easy to use and covers a lot of ground. Only wish the battery lasted slightly longer, but overall it's a great machine for greenhouse work.

data.name: Ramesh Iyer
data.message: I bought a Mechnova brush cutter for my farm in Tamil Nadu. It cuts through thick grass like butter. The engine is smooth, and it's lighter than other brands I've tried.

data.name: Mariana López
data.message: The chainsaw is solid, and customer service helped me get replacement parts easily. Slight delay in delivery, but machine performance made up for it.

data.name: Diego Mendez
data.message: Very impressed with the power of Mechnova's diesel generator. We use it for both farm and home backup, and it hasn't failed us once. Quiet and efficient!

data.name: Kavita Sharma
data.message: The vacuum blower I purchased for my garden is compact and gets the job done without any fuss. Packaging could be better, but functionality is top-notch.

house.tagline: United by innovation, driven by excellence. Our family of brands delivers comprehensive solutions across mechanical engineering, hardware tools, and specialized machinery.

questions.question: What types of machines does Mechnova offer?
questions.answer: Mechnova offers a wide range of equipment including brush cutters, chainsaws, sprayers, generators, engines, water pumps, and domestic tools like pressure washers and vacuum blowers. These machines are suited for agricultural, forestry, fumigation, industrial, and household applications.

questions.question: Who can benefit from Mechnova's products?
questions.answer: Our machines are designed for a broad range of users including farmers, landscapers, warehouse operators, agri-enterprises, construction professionals, and even homeowners seeking compact, low-maintenance tools.

questions.question: What makes Mechnova machines reliable?
questions.answer: Mechnova machines are engineered for high performance, durability, and ease of use. We support our products with strong warranties, thorough quality checks, and unmatched after-sales service to ensure long-term customer satisfaction.

questions.question: Do you provide support to distributors and resellers?
questions.answer: Yes, Mechnova works closely with importers, wholesalers, and retailers. We provide business support including marketing assistance, technical documentation, and reliable product supply to help our partners grow confidently.

questions.question: What is Mechnova's mission?
questions.answer: Our mission is to empower communities globally with efficient, affordable, and high-quality machinery that enhances productivity across agriculture, gardening, fumigation, and domestic needs—all while building lasting partnerships.

about.title: About
about.heroDescription: Mechnova develops outdoor equipment for agriculture, garden care, power backup, and general-purpose use.
about.storyParagraph1: Our machines are designed for users who want practical performance, reliable operation, and long-term support — all at a fair price.
